QuestData.Title: Light Lost
QuestData.Description:
Some of our aspirants foolishly believed they could enter the Maw and make a difference in that dark abyss.
Sadly, they are mistaken. To enter the Maw is to invite eternal damnation.
But not for you.
Please investigate their fate. If you can find them, their souls might once again be free.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Kyrian Aspirants within the Maw and return with their souls to Elysian Hold.

Objectives.Objective: Return to Elysian Hold with the souls of Kyrian Aspirants
